Airbus A380 bụ ụgbọ elu buru ibu nke Airbus mepụtara ma mepụta ya
Ọ bụ ụgbọ elu ndị njem kacha ibu n'ụwa na naanị ụgbọ elu jet nwere oche abụọ nwere ogologo ogologo
Ọmụmụ Airbus malitere na 1988, a mara ọkwa ọrụ ahụ na 1990 iji maa aka ọchịchị Boeing 747 n'ahịa ogologo oge
E gosipụtara ọrụ A3XX a họpụtara na 1994;  Airbus weputara mmemme A380 €9.5 ijeri ($10.7 ijeri) na 19 Disemba 2000
Ekpughere ụdịrị mbụ na Toulouse na 18 Jenụwarị 2005, jiri ụgbọ elu mbụ ya na 27 Eprel 2005
O wee nweta asambodo ụdị ya n'aka ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ụgbọ elu nke Europe
(EASA) na US Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) na 12 December 2006
N'ihi ihe isi ike na eletriki wiwi, mbụ mmepụta e-egbu oge site afọ abụọ na mmepe na-akwụ fọrọ nke nta ka okpukpu abụọ.
